Author: Toxicface#6028
Content: Hi im new to kmd but i think its just awesome. Atomic swap >= ‚Ç¨$¬•> . How KMD will evolved and get value with this awesome wallet?

Author: Toxicface#6028
Content: Exemple, does it gonna cost exemple 1K KMD to be on this wallet as a coin/token or is there a fee somewhere?

Author: Toxicface#6028
Content: What bring + value to kmd in this wallet?

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: all the fees generated from trading will be converted to KMD to pay holders of assets

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: more trades = more KMD demands

Author: Toxicface#6028
Content: Thnx and how people should get interest and want to have kmd if atomic swap is there

Author: Toxicface#6028
Content: Kmd is not needed but the wallet yes

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: there is also a 10% discount in trading fees if you trade using KMD

Author: Toxicface#6028
Content: Is it what we call centralized if you send atomic swap but someone take a fee like a bank?

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: when you send coin from one address to another address, and there is network fees, is that centralized?

Author: Toxicface#6028
Content: Thx it was not fud but trying to understand what is behind. And why i should invest or not

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: The trade is executed using smart contract. No other third party is involved.

Author: Toxicface#6028
Content: Last questions if i dont like to put my coins in a walllet, is a ledger can be use

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: not sure what you are asking.

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: Coins are always stored in wallet address.

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: and you access that using private key or wallet.dat

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: If you don't want to put coin in a wallet then I think you can just send it to another wallet.

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: ledger is also a wallet.

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: So essentially if you send your coin to ledger then you will put your coin in the ledger wallet.

Author: Toxicface#6028
Content: Yes my questions was more if i use a ledger is there a web platform so i always keep my coins there and not on the komodo wallet

Author: Toxicface#6028
Content: To do the swap a kind of third party ledger ü§£

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: maybe some of the moderators can give you update on this. I have not used ledger for a long time.

Author: Toxicface#6028
Content: Thanks for your time and all your answer, have a good day

Content: can't swap directly from ledger
